title: How to Make Vegan Chicken Nuggets

steps.headline: Put the chickpeas in a food processor and pulse until no whole beans are visible.
steps.description: If you don't have a food processor available, a fork or potato masher will work just fine.

steps.headline: Add ingredients to a medium-sized bowl.
steps.description: Add in textured vegetable protein, vital wheat gluten, mashed chickpeas, soy sauce, mustard, spices, water, and agave mix together with a spoon.

steps.headline: Place the chickpea mixture on a clean, flat surface.
steps.description: Knead the mixture until gluten strands form, and any extra bubbles are gone then create 1 big ball out of the mixture.

steps.headline: Add dry ingredients for breading in another mixing bowl.
Grab another different bowl and whisk together lemon juice and dairy-free milk until foam starts to form.
Rip nugget sized pieces from the gluten then flatten with your hands to create the form of a chicken nugget.
Dip each nugget into the liquid mixture first then the breading mixture.
steps.description: Make sure each nugget is coated well!

steps.headline: Lay all nuggets on a plate until all the gluten is used up.
Cook the nuggets by frying or baking.
steps.description: With hot oil fry the nugget for 3-4 minutes on each side until golden brown or bake the nuggets for 25 minutes (flip after first 10 minutes) in a 350°F preheated oven.

steps.headline: Enjoy your vegan chicken nuggets and happy dipping!
steps.description: Use any sauce you prefer like bbq sauce, ketchup, hot sauce, veganaise, mustard, etc.

text: Put the chickpeas in a food processor and pulse until no whole beans are visible. If you don't have a food processor available, a fork or potato masher will work just fine. Add ingredients to a medium-sized bowl. Add in textured vegetable protein, vital wheat gluten, mashed chickpeas, soy sauce, mustard, spices, water, and agave mix together with a spoon. Place the chickpea mixture on a clean, flat surface. Knead the mixture until gluten strands form, and any extra bubbles are gone then create 1 big ball out of the mixture. Add dry ingredients for breading in another mixing bowl. Mix well. Grab another different bowl and whisk together lemon juice and dairy-free milk until foam starts to form.  Rip nugget sized pieces from the gluten then flatten with your hands to create the form of a chicken nugget.  Dip each nugget into the liquid mixture first then the breading mixture. Make sure each nugget is coated well! Lay all nuggets on a plate until all the gluten is used up.  Cook the nuggets by frying or baking. With hot oil fry the nugget for 3-4 minutes on each side until golden brown or bake the nuggets for 25 minutes (flip after first 10 minutes) in a 350°F preheated oven. Enjoy your vegan chicken nuggets and happy dipping! Use any sauce you prefer like bbq sauce, ketchup, hot sauce, veganaise, mustard, etc.
